page.title: 18St. Paul's Church today
page.content: The congregation of St. Paul's numbers between 40 and 50. This includes youngsters. There has been a decline in the size of the congregation in the last 25 years because of the closure of the pits. Numbers increase at the main Christian festivals. During the course of a year there will be about 70 funerals for the whole parish. 6 to 8 of these will be burials and the remainder cremations. 20 to 30 wedding services are held each year. Baptisms take place on one Sunday each month. Services held every Sunday are Matins at 8.00 a.m., Communion at 10.30a.m. and Evensong at 5.00p.m. There is no Sunday school because there is no suitable room available. Children are involved in the choir and help as servers.The vicar visits our school regularly.
